availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Smarr (Bracken Count, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Amelia Tarlton in November 1838. Father of Edward J. Smarr, John Smarr, James H. Smarr, Rueben C. Smarr, Ann M. Smarr, Josephine Smarr, Nancy E. Smarr, and Henry Smarr. Farmer in Bracken County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 393B-394A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Bracken County, District 1, p. 148.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, File #000344098, Bracken County, November 14, 1838 (accessed via ancestry.com).
